description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ksqc","text":"This document outlines the acceptance criteria and workflow for notification, screening, acceptance and logistics of donor lung collection between Duke University Medical Center and our local Organ Procurement Organizations. Donor Lungs accepted for the SCENT protocol arrive to our Surgery Substrate Services Core packaged on ice, en bloc and are processed and banked by a Duke Histologist. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fj6v0","text":"Inclusion Criteria:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pc0q","text":"    • All ages (if donor is ≤ 18yo refer to peds exclusion list)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2f0m7","text":"    • Brain Dead (DBD) or Death by Circulatory Death (DCD)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ciu6m","text":"    • Is the donor research consented?","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65dd2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddr23","text":"Exclusion Criteria - Adults:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bplgk","text":"    • PCR COVID+ Donors (must have at least 1 follow up negative results for COVID+ within the last                 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uigl","text":"       month.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dv65","text":"    • HIV Positive ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a3d0t","text":"    • COPD
